ing.item: Salt and fresh ground pepper or lemon pepper; to taste

directions.step:
From: gregfam@aa.net (Lee Grgory)
Date: 16 Oct 1995 05:50:00 -0600
In bottom of shallow baking or broiling pan, spread oil,lemon juice, and pepper. Swish fish around in pan, coating both sides. Sprinkle with parsley. Broil 3-4 minutes on each side or until edges are browned. Serve with lemon wedges and sprinkle with salt or additional lemon pepper.
REC.FOOD.RECIPES ARCHIVES
/CAKES
